name: The Fog Maze
description:
An night foggy maze challenge. Press "esc" to start and there a message before you going, In the first scene the indoor maze had 3 wooden arrow sign, if you ignore the sign you will stuck. In the last scene you need to found the exit by yourself but don't worry, There's a hidden collider text like "Three", "Two", "One", "Zero" with colors in it, After found the last word "Zero" you finally going to end this dark night. So there nothing wrong to try it. it has no timer and the light still on if you play this in "Simple" quality.

This game is playing with the keyboard only so there no interactive with cursors, probably the mouse is to moving the cam.

Controls: WASD/Arrow Key (⬅⬆⬇➡)

Credits to freesound and dafont.
